statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT quantity, ingredient_name FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE reorder_threshold < 10 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, ingredient_name
SELECT ingredient_name, reorder_threshold FROM inventory WHERE reorder_threshold BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY reorder_threshold DESC, ingredient_name
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 75 AND reorder_threshold < 25 ORDER BY quantity DESC, reorder_threshold
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, reorder_threshold FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND ingredient_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY ingredient_name
SELECT * FROM ingredient_inventory;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, reorder_level FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE reorder_level < 5 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT id, notification_message, notification_date FROM order_notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE quantity >= 20 AND reorder_level < 10 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC
SELECT id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE reorder_level < 50
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT ingredient_name, notification_message, notification_date FROM ingredient_inventory JOIN order_notifications ON ingredient_inventory.id = order_notifications.ingredient_id
SELECT * FROM order_notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock, reorder_threshold FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < 10 ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT notification_id, ingredient_name, notification_date FROM ReorderNotifications JOIN Ingredients ON ReorderNotifications.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Ingredients ON Orders.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT notification_date FROM ReorderNotifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock, order_quantity FROM Ingredients JOIN Orders ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = Orders.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE reorder_level < 10;
SELECT id, name, description FROM recipes ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_cost FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT id, message, sent_date FROM notifications WHERE viewed = false;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE reorder_level < 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM recipes WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, order_date, total_cost FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT message, sent_date FROM notifications WHERE viewed = FALSE ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE reorder_level < 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT ingredient_id, inventory_level FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 50 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Foods%' ORDER BY supplier_id;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY notification_id DESC;

SELECT ingredient_name, inventory_level FROM ingredients INNER JOIN inventory_logs ON ingredients.ingredient_id = inventory_logs.ingredient_id WHERE inventory_level < reorder_level ORDER BY inventory_level ASC;
